Description: Offering personalized wellness plans through a subscription model, where users receive monthly updates and products tailored to their health needs.
Integration of IoT devices in pet products, such as smart collars that monitor pet's location, activity, and health stats.
Providing DIY home improvement kits with AR instructions for easy assembly and installation, enhancing customer engagement and satisfaction.
Implementing biodegradable or reusable packaging options for all fashion items to promote environmental sustainability among consumers.
Hosting live, virtual gourmet tasting sessions led by chefs to introduce new products and provide cooking tips, paired with direct-to-door delivery of tasting kits.
